title: The Case of Ezra Miller: When Should We Separate the Art from the Artist?
itunes:title: The Case of Ezra Miller: When Should We Separate the Art from the Artist?
itunes:subtitle: How shitty does someone need to be for us to stop consuming their art?
description:
This week, the Basic and the Brain are discussing Ezra Miler's recent bizarre and erratic behaviors. We run through the timeline of events and how things keep getting worse, we discuss public sentiment around Ezra, the reaction of the studios that work with Ezra (why has Warner Bros been slow to the punch with handling the situation?), and discussing various problematic figures in entertainment (people we've collectively loved and others we outright hate) all while debating should we be separating the art from the artist? If so, then when does it make sense?



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
